title: The Beginning
descrip:
The year: 2050

The place: Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada

About: Power, ambition and office romance.

Section plan: Groups of characters are introduced and daily life in 2050 is illustrated by example. People and situations are recognizable (some things never change), even amongst the amazing new gadgetry and innovative social organization.

Each group constitutes a subplot, and initially they appear to be unrelated or independent of each other. We, as readers, develop hopes and expectations for how the subplots will work out for the characters. We wonder how the subplots will eventually be connected, if at all.

title: The Middle
descrip:
Section plan: Subplots are advanced incrementally, one after another in circular fashion. Events are approximately simultaneous, but with each cycle the subplots proceed temporally in a sort of spiral, like a wire spring.

The subplots converge and start to affect each other. It gets harder to predict the trajectories of individual subplots; they've all been subsumed into one big and more complicated plot. Characters are faced with more influences pushing them in different directions. Tension starts to rise as the competing interests clash.

title: Monday
descrip:
Chapter plan: Lyre and Eager meet and experience intense attraction. This triggers warnings from their respective shurpas. The shurpas don't try to contradict their owners, but they assess the dangers and take up negotiating positions to mediate.

Meanwhile, subplots are launched:
a) Fear & loathing at the office
b) Walf & Sarba tragic romance
c) Pool's travails with shurpas
d) Zero's new shurpa hack.

title: Tuesday
descrip: Chapter plan: Lyre and Eager engineer a meeting. Consumation.

title: Wednesday
descrip: Chapter plan: Bliss, when differences and potential conflicts seem small.

title: Thursday
descrip: Chapter plan: More intense negotiations when the differences in understanding seem irreconcilable.

title: Friday
descrip: Chapter plan: Crisis of decision when Mother is closing in.

title: Sunday
descrip: Chapter plan: Resolution. Lyre and Eager go their own ways, sadder but wiser.
